full_summary:
================

**Canceled Tender Notice: T2012-220031/B**
-----------------------------------------------

**Reference Number:** PW- HAL-202-11615

**Publication Date:** January 23, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** February 21, 2023, 13:00:00

The Solicitation Notice for the **Package Plant - Marine** (G-SIN: N4630AS) tender has been cancelled.

[Tender Notice](#tender-notice)

The **Public Works and Government Services Canada** (PW & GSC) is no longer seeking a contractor for the aforementioned Package Plant - Marine tender. The tenders will be accepted until **February 21, 2023, at 13:00:00**. Due to the cancellation, no further action is required from interested parties.

**Contract and Tender Information:**

*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Contracting Entity:** Public Works and Government Services Canada
*   **End User Entity:** Transport Canada
*   **Regions of Delivery.:** Nova Scotia

**Contact:**
------------

**Name:** Chris Young

**Email:** <christopher.young@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca>

**Phone:** (902) 476-8829

**Fax:** (902) 496-5016

**Location:** 1713 Bedford Row, Halifax, Nova Scotia B3J 1T3

Note: This cancellation may have an impact on any previous communications or documents issued in relation to this tender. Hard copies of any unprovided documentation can be requested by written request before the closing date.

This notice was taken from a Government Contract portal. All information is to be verified with the original contractor.
